name: Super Death Game SHOW! VR
description:
─ ─ How did this happen? It seems that future TV shows have gone as far as they can go. Incredible cash prizes if you complete your mission, but if you fail, you'll have to go to.......
We bring you the most psychotic and crazy VR experience.

Features

  • Recommended for first time VR experience：
    Super Death Game SHOW! is full of fun experiences, mainly hand and tool actions and physical behaviors in VR, and it is recommended for VR beginners as it does not require any moving controls that can cause VR sickness!
  • Numerous unique missions：
    There is no such thing as a "context" for the content of the missions. A wide range of missions await you, from "target practice" and "building blocks" to "solving riddles" and "chick sexing".
  • High risk & high return：
    It is your life that hangs in the balance against great wealth. Of course, there is no soft save and load in the middle of the game. If you die, you're done. Recommended for risk junkies.
  • Ideal for Live Streaming：
    You can display the Live Chat that is being broadcast in-game!　Let the whole world see your courage and have a great time!

From the program manager DeathGame Man


The Super Death Game Show has begun again this week.
Will you be a millionaire or will you die?
I am the Game of Death Man and I will be your host. Best regards.

In this Super Death Game SHOW,
you will be challenged to perform a variety of "simple" tasks.

Each mission has a prize or reward for completing it.
Prizes range from a minimum of a million yen-dollars (￥$) to several hundred million yen-dollars (￥$). It's a dream come true.

That way, if you can complete 10 missions, you win.
So you can take home the prize money.

...... However, if you fail the mission,
You will die. You will die.
It is truly super-risk-super-return, perfect for a challenger like you.

Well, that's it for the explanation of the rules.
Please note that we will not be able to answer any questions. Viewers, please be moderate with spoilers.

Super Death Game SHOW! is now open!
